line.annotation: create_ing(ing43, "1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a medium-sized mixing bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan cheese and onion.
In a medium-sized mixing bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan cheese and onion.
line.annotation: combine({ing40, ing41, ing42, ing44}, ing47, "things in bowl", "")

line.originaltext: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan cheese and onion.
In a medium-sized mixing bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan cheese and onion.
line.annotation: mix(ing47, , ing48, "stirred things in bowl", "stir together")

line.originaltext: When these ingredients are combined, mix in artichoke hearts, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing43, ing45, ing46, ing48}, ing49, "everything in bowl", "mix in")

line.originaltext: Transfer mixture to a shallow baking dish.
Transfer mixture to a shallow baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 20 minutes, or until light brown on top.
line.annotation: cook(ing49, t11, ing50, "artichoke dip", "bake for 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 20 minutes, or until light brown on top.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 20 minutes, or until light brown on top.
